name: Suikorunes Gensofighter
description:
:

Suiokorunes Gensofighter is fighting suikoden II fansgame, all asset is from suikoden II ripping resources with some adjustment (source). this battle mechanic is using Galv's Fighting System Script. some of video maybe broken in some condition, but it's barely playable. currently fighting style is not have combo's yet. and fighting style of it's charachter is basically same, but some charachter still has unique run ability that can be used using some combo movement.

Currently Game Features: 

  1. Fighting System
  2. Charachter Selection
  3. Map Selection
  4. Skill runes
